abstract: The World of Color is part of a $1 billion overhaul of Disney’s California Adventure theme park.
snippet: The World of Color is part of a $1 billion overhaul of Disney’s California Adventure theme park.
lead_paragraph: ANAHEIM, Calif.  Can an expensive fountain extravaganza finally turn the Walt Disney Company’s California Adventure theme park here into a hit?

headline.main: Disney Hopes Wall of Water Will Revive Theme Park
headline.print_headline: Disney Hopes Wall of Water Will Revive Theme Park

abstract: The Walt Disney Company is shutting down five ESPN Zone restaurants, leaving only the Los Angeles and Anaheim, Calif., outlets open.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company is shutting down five ESPN Zone restaurants, leaving only the Los Angeles and Anaheim, Calif., outlets open.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company is closing five ESPN Zone restaurants, saying the economics of the business became too challenging.

headline.main: Disney Says It Will Close 5 ESPN Zone Restaurants
headline.print_headline: Disney Says It Will Close 5 ESPN Zone Restaurants

abstract: Representatives of Hollywood’s principal guilds have told the Walt Disney Company that they have serious concerns about the possible sale of its Miramax Films unit to an investor group organized by David Bergstein.
snippet: Representatives of Hollywood’s principal guilds have told the Walt Disney Company that they have serious concerns about the possible sale of its Miramax Films unit to an investor group organized by David Bergstein.
lead_paragraph: Representatives of Hollywood’s principal guilds have told the Walt Disney Company that they have serious concerns about the possible sale of its Miramax Films unit to an investor group organized by David Bergstein. A number of his companies are the subject of involuntary bankruptcy proceedings in which the guilds are creditors.

headline.main: Guilds Express Concern About Possible Miramax Sale

byline.original: By Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes
